title: UPMC didn’t have to put seniors through all this stress
text:
Published By: Pittsburgh Post: Opinion - Today 
I read Steve Twedt’s Oct. 6 article “State Supreme Court to Hear Case Involving UPMC, Highmark.” That article took me back to a day in...
